influence_map.description: How external events, earnings, and key people INFLUENCE our positions. The brain needs to understand relationships, not just track tickers in isolation.

earnings_influence.description: When these report, watch for signals that affect OUR names

NVDA.why_it_matters: Jensen sets the tone for entire AI infrastructure sector

signal_interpretation.strong_data_center: BUY signal for MU, memory names
signal_interpretation.weak_guidance: Risk off for whole AI infrastructure sector

MSFT.why_it_matters: Azure cloud growth = AI infrastructure demand

signal_interpretation.azure_accelerating: Cloud infra demand up, good for MU

META.why_it_matters: Zuck spending billions on AI infrastructure

signal_interpretation.capex_up: More data centers = more power (GEV), cooling (VRT), memory (MU)
signal_interpretation.capex_cut: Risk off signal for AI infrastructure

TSLA.why_it_matters: Musk controls narrative, mentions SpaceX, affects EV sector sentiment

signal_interpretation.musk_bullish: Risk on for all Musk-adjacent plays

AMZN.why_it_matters: AWS is massive cloud player, Kuiper satellites

GEV.why_it_matters: Direct power generation play for data centers

LRCX.why_it_matters: Chip equipment orders = semiconductor cycle health

macro_events_influence.description: How economic events affect our sectors

FOMC.why_it_matters: Interest rates affect all risk assets, especially small caps

signal_interpretation.rates_hold_dovish: Risk on, small caps benefit, our names run
signal_interpretation.surprise_hike: Risk off panic, sell momentum names

sector_impacts.biotech: Very rate sensitive - cuts help, hikes hurt
sector_impacts.defense: Less rate sensitive - government spending doesn't care about rates
sector_impacts.ai_infrastructure: High sensitivity - growth stocks need low rates

CPI_inflation.why_it_matters: Inflation data drives Fed policy expectations

signal_interpretation.lower_than_expected: Rate cuts more likely, risk on
signal_interpretation.higher_than_expected: Rates higher for longer, risk off

signal_interpretation.strong_jobs: Economy good but rates stay high
signal_interpretation.weak_jobs: Rate cuts coming, risk on for growth

defense_budget.why_it_matters: Direct impact on our defense positions

uranium_spot_price.why_it_matters: Direct correlation to our uranium positions

signal_interpretation.spot_up: All uranium names benefit, we win

russia_ukraine.why_it_matters: Energy prices, defense spending, uranium supply

signal_interpretation.escalation: Defense spending up, uranium supply concerns

middle_east.why_it_matters: Oil prices, general market risk sentiment

key_people_influence.description: When these people speak or act, pay attention

jensen_huang.why_it_matters: His words move the entire AI sector
jensen_huang.recent_action: Mentioned HBM memory at CES - MU catalyst

signal_interpretation.mentions_memory: Direct MU catalyst - he mentioned HBM at CES
signal_interpretation.supply_constraints: Memory demand exceeds supply = MU wins

elon_musk.why_it_matters: Market moves on his tweets and comments

signal_interpretation.energy_plays: Policy tailwind coming for power sector

trump_administration.why_it_matters: Defense budget, rare earth policy, trade policy

signal_interpretation.rare_earth_policy: UUUU rare earth acquisition more valuable
signal_interpretation.china_tariffs: Supply chain reshoring benefits domestic plays

sam_altman.why_it_matters: AI infrastructure demand driver, backs OKLO

divergence_signals.nvda_flat_sector_up: Rotation into cheaper plays, good for MU

biotech.note: Biotech is most disconnected from sector - company-specific catalysts dominate

space.catalyst: Launch success, contract awards, SpaceX news
space.musk_effect: SpaceX news moves entire space sector

cybersecurity.note: Sector rotates in/out based on breach news

pre_market.our_action: Prepare to sell NTLA at open
pre_market.watch_overnight_earnings: React to MSFT/META/TSLA if they moved after hours

market_open_930am.watch: MRNO - above $2.20 hold, between $2.00-2.20 watch, below $1.80 cut
market_open_930am.sector_check: How are AI, defense, uranium sectors opening

fomc_2pm.our_action: NO new positions until after Powell
fomc_2pm.volatility_warning: First 15 min after decision = noise, don't trade

powell_230pm.if_dovish: Risk on - our growth names benefit
powell_230pm.if_hawkish: Caution - hold thesis names but don't add

priority_listening.MSFT: Azure growth, AI capex - affects MU
priority_listening.META: AI infrastructure spend - affects MU, VRT, GEV
priority_listening.TSLA: SpaceX mentions - affects RDW, space sector, IPO watch
priority_listening.GEV: Data center contracts - affects power thesis

after_close.our_action: Watch calls for AI capex signals (affects MU)

wednesday_implication.if_earnings_miss: Risk off, hold thesis names, don't chase

brain_reasoning_examples.description: How the brain should connect dots

example_1_msft_earnings_to_mu.event: MSFT reports Azure growth accelerated to 35%
brain_reasoning: Consider: Is this priced in? Check MU movement after MSFT report.
example_1_msft_earnings_to_mu.action: If MU flat after MSFT beat, buying opportunity

brain_reasoning: UUUU also has rare earth play (June 2026 catalyst)
Rising spot = revenue expansion for producers
example_2_uranium_spot_to_positions.action: Monitor for pullback to add, or let winners run with trail stop

brain_reasoning: RCAT won't win this specific contract (too small)
But signals more contracts coming, sector hot
example_3_defense_contract_to_rcat.action: Hold RCAT, thesis validated. Watch for RCAT-specific announcements.

example_4_pelosi_trade_to_watchlist.event: Pelosi buys calls on new energy stock
brain_reasoning: Energy play = power demand or nuclear?
Could relate to AI data center power needs
Research company, check if it fits our thesis
If thesis matches, consider adding to watchlist
example_4_pelosi_trade_to_watchlist.action: Research immediately, assess convergence, add if qualified

example_5_jensen_mentions_memory.event: Jensen at conference says 'HBM is the bottleneck'
example_5_jensen_mentions_memory.action: Hold MU with conviction, potentially add on pullback
